feed.title: EspoCRM Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for EspoCRM:
entry.content:
Improvements:

  • Varchar field: Any Of and None Of filters https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3271
  • Lead capture: Custom page title for web forms https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3272
  • Lead capture: Ability to use different theme for web form https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3273
  • Target list categories https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3274
  • Image modal full screen view https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3275
  • Detail and list view refresh on header title click https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3284
  • Preferences parameter to make page content width wider https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3290
  • Campaign: Informational Email type https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3296
  • Knowledge base: Full-text search https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3316
  • Collapsible quick create and edit modals https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3320
  • Formula: Return the last expression https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3307
  • Formula: Array appending with [] syntax https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3322
  • Formula: Increment & decrement https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3323
  • Formula: Getting and setting array and object item values by key with [] syntax https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3324
  • Record dashlet: Layout field parameters https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3329
  • Required-field dynamic logic in backend https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3332
  • Saved-state conditions making field read-only https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3335
  • View stream attachments https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3339
  • OIDC authentication: Support UserInfo endpoint https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3341

Enhancements:

  • OAuth providers and accounts https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3321https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3321

All issues: https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/milestone/210?closed=1
